StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertUpdateBoard]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID int, @Organiza.onID int, @FriendlyName varchar(30), @BoardDate date.me, @IsDeleted bit ) AS
IF EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[Board] WHERE BOARD_ID = @ID) BEGIN UPDATE [mcriss].[dbo].[Board] SET [ORGANIZATION_ID] = @Organiza.onID ,[FRIENDLY_NAME] = @FriendlyName ,[BOARD_DATE] = @BoardDate ,[IS_DELETED] = @IsDeleted WHERE BOARD_ID = @ID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [mcriss].[dbo].[BOARD] ([ORGANIZATION_ID] ,[FRIENDLY_NAME] ,[BOARD_DATE] ,[IS_DELETED]) VALUES (@Organiza.onID ,@FriendlyName ,@BoardDate ,@IsDeleted) END
